response Extensive experience monitoring tracking and evaluating global IT infrastructure incidents through penetration testing as well as organizing data reports and logs for enhanced security Roseland NJ March 2018 to Present Monitor manage and fortify user integrity on a global scale using latest cyber security tools and practices while building layers of defense and creating best have the potential to impact the organization Deployment of AWS Guardduty Cloud Formation Templates CloudTrail development and CloudWatch monitoring Performed cyber threat intelligence analysis networks and participate in the coordination of resources during incident response efforts Coordinated resources during enterprise incident response efforts driving incidents to timely and complete
